Text:
pro tip: don't title your torrent "season 1 & 2" if it doesn't contain __all episodes__ of seasons 1 & 2.  you're missing the last 11 episodes of season 1, and while your season 2 is current, it will be out of date by the end of the week.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1286039/episodes
Are you sure it's not Season 1 they cut it into halfs so and it was released that way on dvd I've not downloaded it because I knew season 2 wasn't over.
